name: Stochastic Boundary Conditions
rationale: PRD ยง4.6: %K = 100 when close = highest high, %K = 0 when close = lowest low

test_cases.name: close_at_high_k100
test_cases.notes: When close[2]=15 equals highest high in window, %K = 100

test_cases.name: close_at_low_k0
test_cases.notes: When close[2]=8 equals lowest low in window, %K = 0
